attributes.action: subsidise bus companies that regularly alter thier routes according to local residents requirements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only reason I drive a car to work is because there are no direct bus routes - if a bus company recorded where people want to go and at what time and designed routes accordingly people might be more inclined to use them. This process should be dynamic, changing as people move house and routes fall in or out of use.
